feedly.title: Step by step manual with Feedly.com

steps.title: Visit http://feedly.com/i/spotlight/maxdome-rssfeeds.herokuapp.com or click 'Add Content' and insert 'http://maxdome-rssfeeds.herokuapp.com/'
Select the RSS Feeds you will be up to date
Download and install 'feedly' from the app store
Select the RSS Feeds you will be up to date
Personal recommend: Open the settings. In the 'Look and Feel' section change 'Transition' to 'scroll' and 'Default View' to 'List'
